SELECT csd.id ammeterId, ch.area apartmentName, CONCAT( cau.first_name, cau.last_name ) landlordName, cau.username authUserName, ch.address houseAddress, cr.`name` roomNo, crc.customer_name customerName, crc.customer_phone customerPhone, csd.`name` deviceName, csd.`online` communicationStatus, csd.style isHub, '0' `type` FROM caspain_test.smart_device csd left join caspain_test.room cr on csd.room_id=cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch on cr.house_id=ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room_contract crc on crc.room_id=cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau on crc.created_by_id = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (csd.is_delete != '1' or csd.is_delete is null) AND (ch.is_delete != '1' or ch.is_delete is null) AND (cr.is_delete != '1' or cr.is_delete is null) AND (crc.is_delete != '1' or crc.is_delete is null) AND ( ( csd.style = '0' AND crc.`status` = 'active' ) OR csd.style = '1' )
AND csd.id = '${ammeterId}'
AND ch.area LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND cau.last_name LIKE '%${landlordName}%'
AND crc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND csd.`name` LIKE '%${deviceName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND crc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND ch.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND ch.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND ch.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND csd.`online` LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'
and csd.bind='1' order by csd.updated_at desc

SELECT vsd.id ammeterId, va.`name` apartmentName, CONCAT( cau.first_name, cau.last_name ) landlordName, cau.username authUserName, va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vrc.customer_name customerName, vrc.customer_phone customerPhone, vsd.`name` deviceName, vsd.`online` communicationStatus, vsd.style isHub, '1' `type` FROM `volga_test`.smart_device vsd left join `volga_test`.room vr on vsd.room_id=vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va on vr.apartment_id=va.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room_contract vrc on vrc.room_id=vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.area varea on va.area=varea.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau on vrc.created_by = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (vsd.is_delete != '1' or vsd.is_delete is null) AND (va.is_delete != '1' or va.is_delete is null) AND (vr.is_delete != '1' or vr.is_delete is null) AND (vrc.is_delete != '1' or vrc.is_delete is null) AND ( ( vsd.style = '0' AND vrc.`status` = 'active' ) OR vsd.style = '1' )
AND vsd.id = '${ammeterId}'
AND va.`name` LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND CONCAT(cau.first_name,cau.last_name) LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND vrc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND vsd.`name` LIKE '%${deviceName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND vrc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND va.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND va.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND va.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND vsd.`online` LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'
and vsd.bind='1' order by vsd.updated_at desc
select * from caspain_test.smart_device sd where sd.id=#{id}
select * from caspain_test.smart_device sd where sd.master=#{serialId}
SELECT sd.uuid FROM caspain_test.smart_device sd WHERE sd.id=#{id}
SELECT sd.uuid FROM `volga_test`.smart_device sd WHERE sd.id=#{id}

SELECT csd.id id, csd.uuid uuid, csd.wiring useCase, csdpc.charge payMod, crc.customer_name customerName, crc.customer_phone customerPhone, ch.address address, cr.`name` roomNo, csd.`name` deviceName, ( CASE WHEN csd.style = '1' THEN GROUP_CONCAT( IFNULL(cr2.`name`, ''), CHAR (9), IFNULL(csd2.`share`, ''), '%' ) ELSE NULL END ) subAmmeterInfo, crc.start_time checkInDate, csd.style isHub, csd.share share FROM caspain_test.smart_device csd LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_device_power_contract csdpc ON csd.id = csdpc.power_meter_id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room cr ON csd.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cr.house_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room_contract crc ON crc.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON crc.created_by_id = cau.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_device csd2 ON csd2.`master` = csd.serial_id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room cr2 ON csd2.room_id = cr2.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( csd.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( ch.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cr.is_delete != '1' OR cr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND csd.id = #{id} GROUP BY csd.id order by csd.updated_at desc

( SELECT vsd.id id, vsd.uuid uuid, vsd.wiring useCase, vsdpc.charge payMod, vrc.customer_name customerName, vrc.customer_phone customerPhone, va.address address, vr.`name` roomNo, vsd.`name` deviceName, '' subAmmeterInfo, vrc.start_time checkInDate, vsd.style isHub, vsd.share share FROM `volga_test`.smart_device vsd LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.smart_device_power_contract vsdpc ON vsd.id = vsdpc.power_meter_id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room vr ON vsd.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.floor vf ON vr.floor_id = vf.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vf.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room_contract vrc ON vrc.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON vrc.created_by = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vsd.is_delete != '1' OR vsd.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vr.is_delete != '1' OR vr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND vsd.id = #{id} AND vsd.style = '0' GROUP BY vsd.id ) UNION ( SELECT vsd.id id, vsd.uuid uuid, vsd.wiring useCase, vsdpc.charge payMod, '' customerName, '' customerPhone, va.address address, '' roomNo, vsd.`name` deviceName, ( CASE WHEN vsd2.`share` IS NOT NULL THEN GROUP_CONCAT( IFNULL(vr2.`name`, ''), CHAR (9), IFNULL(vsd2.`share`, ''), '%' ) ELSE NULL END ) subAmmeterInfo, '' checkInDate, vsd.style isHub, vsd.share share FROM `volga_test`.smart_device vsd LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.smart_device_power_contract vsdpc ON vsd.id = vsdpc.power_meter_id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.floor vf ON vsd.floor = vf.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vf.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.smart_device vsd2 ON vsd2.`master` = vsd.serial_id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room vr2 ON vsd2.room_id = vr2.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vsd.is_delete != '1' OR vsd.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL ) AND vsd.id = #{id} AND vsd.style = '1' GROUP BY vsd.id )
SELECT ctsdm.* from caspain_test.smart_device ctsdm,caspain_test.smart_device ctsds where ctsds.master=ctsdm.serial_id and ctsds.id=#{id}
SELECT ctsds.serial_id FROM caspain_test.smart_device ctsdm, caspain_test.smart_device ctsds, caspain_test.room WHERE ctsds.`master` = ctsdm.serial_id AND ctsdm.id = #{id}
